name: Kuru Kuru Cube
overview: Kuru Kuru Cube is a puzzle game that features characters of the game series Iwatobi Penguin Rocky X Hopper. The gameplay is about move the cursor over the falling pieces and that makes them rotate, if the player can get 4 of the same colour to be together they dissappear. To make that the whole cube can be rotate in the 4 directions. The player can choose the difficulty level (easy. normal & hard) and also the game speed. Game Modes: - 1 Player game: In this mode there are 3 modes: - Story Mode: Advance through the story defeating the different enemies. - Endless Mode: Survive joining pieces until you can and make the best hi-score. - Time attack: Join pieces in a limited time. - 2 Player game: Vs or Time modes in which 2 players compete in a split-screen mode. In this mode the game features 8 different characters to choose from.
